mapper.select: select count(*) from t_seckill_commodity tsc,t_commodity tc,t_seckill_time tst where tsc.commodityId = tc.id and tsc.seckillTimeId = tst.id

select tsc.id,tc.number artNo,tc.`name` name,tc.price price,seckillPrice, tc.store seckillCount,tsc.limitationCount,tsc.surplusCount from t_seckill_commodity tsc,t_commodity tc,t_seckill_time tst where tsc.commodityId = tc.id and tsc.seckillTimeId = tst.id limit #{start},#{rows}
